title: XRP Edges Out Bitcoin Liquidations Dominance In One Hour. Here’s the Significance
body: In a surprising market development, XRP has overtaken Bitcoin in hourly futures liquidations, signaling heightened volatility and leveraged exposure for the altcoin. XRP’s derivatives market activity has shown signs of increasing instability despite joining the broader market’s downward trajectory. According to updated data from CoinGlass, XRP experienced $1.19 million in liquidations within a single hour, eclipsing Bitcoin’s $823,340 over the same period. This abrupt shift points to a significant level of leveraged trading interest in XRP. The breakdown reveals that long positions bore the brunt of these losses, with nearly the entire liquidation amount attributed to traders anticipating a price increase. In contrast, short positions accounted for just $33,000. The pattern was mirrored in Bitcoin’s case, though on a slightly smaller scale, where long traders also experienced most of the drawdown. Volatility Heightens as Support Levels Break XRP’s rising liquidation volume comes when the asset has shown limited performance strength. The asset recently slipped below a key support level of $2.1, highlighting weakening momentum. It has regained this level, currently trading at $2.12. However, this breakout was not decisive, and the price drop of over 6% over a week has intensified fears that the asset may fall below $2.1 again. XRP recently experienced notable liquidation events , and he concentration of liquidations in long positions suggests that many traders were expecting a bullish reversal that failed to materialize. This mismatch between market sentiment and price action has not only triggered forced exits but may also contribute to further volatility if traders continue to take on excessive risk in anticipation of a rebound. We are on twitter, follow us to connect with us :- @TimesTabloid1 — TimesTabloid (@TimesTabloid1) July 15, 2023 XRP’s Market Prospects Although XRP demonstrates signs of independent movement in the derivatives market, it remains closely tied to Bitcoin’s price direction. Historically, XRP has reacted to major BTC trends, and a significant rally in Bitcoin could still catalyze recovery. The broader macroeconomic environment also plays a crucial role in shaping trader expectations. Market participants are closely watching upcoming U.S. Federal Reserve decisions, as any adjustment in monetary policy could affect investor sentiment across the crypto sector. There are rumors that the Federal Reserve will adopt XRP for global transactions. While unconfirmed, a favorable policy shift could reduce risk aversion and stimulate renewed capital inflows into the crypto market. Additionally, recent reports suggest that XRP ETFs may receive SEC approval this month , and the community is excited for the digital asset’s reaction if these products are approved. XRP faces a challenging environment, but multiple factors point toward a bullish reversal in the near term. Disclaimer : This content is meant to inform and should not be considered financial advice. The views expressed in this article may include the author’s personal opinions and do not represent Times Tabloid’s opinion. Readers are urged to do in-depth research before making any investment decisions. Any action taken by the reader is strictly at their own risk. Times Tabloid is not responsible for any financial losses. Follow us on X , Facebook , Telegram , and Google News The post XRP Edges Out Bitcoin Liquidations Dominance In One Hour. Here’s the Significance appeared first on Times Tabloid .

title: Best Cryptocurrency to Buy Now As New Hampshire Approves First Crypto Reserve Law
body: Since the beginning of the year, several U.S. states have been exploring crypto as part of their financial strategy, but New Hampshire just took the lead. It’s now the first state to pass a law allowing public funds to be invested in crypto, signaling a shift that could have nationwide ripple effects. With this move, the conversation around the best crypto to buy now becomes more urgent, and Bitcoin just gained a powerful new backer. New Hampshire’s Bitcoin Reserve Law The newly signed law in New Hampshire marks the first time a U.S. state has officially given the green light to invest public funds up to 5% in cryptocurrency. But there’s a strict threshold: only digital assets with a market cap of at least $500 billion qualify, which, for now, means Bitcoin is the sole beneficiary. The law is more than a symbolic move. It’s a blueprint for financial diversification in the face of persistent inflation and federal monetary expansion. According to Rep. Keith Ammon, the bill’s architect, the objective is clear: protect state funds by anchoring part of them in a deflationary digital asset with a finite supply. While Arizona and Florida stumbled, Arizona’s bill was vetoed and Florida withdrew its own proposal—New Hampshire succeeded, thanks in part to lobbying from groups like the Satoshi Action Fund. Its founder, Dennis Porter, called the move a breakthrough, noting that political momentum now has a proven path. This could set off a chain reaction. With North Carolina and others still in the race, New Hampshire’s precedent now provides validation and pressure. As more states consider similar legislation, and as Trump floats a federal reserve of digital assets, Bitcoin’s legitimacy as a store of value continues to solidify in institutional circles. For retail investors watching these moves closely, the writing is on the wall: Bitcoin isn’t just for speculation anymore, it’s being discussed in the same breath as treasuries and sovereign funds. Best Crypto to Buy Now as Crypto Reserve Law Goes Live SUBBD Imagine a platform where creators aren’t at the mercy of algorithms, profit-sharing clauses, or shadow bans. That’s the core proposition behind SUBBD —a project that doesn’t just decentralize the creator economy but reshapes how influence is monetized. The $SUBBD token powers a protocol designed to return control to creators, enabling them to tokenize engagement, loyalty, and access in ways legacy platforms can’t replicate. Rather than treating content as something to be rented out through ads and affiliate links, SUBBD allows it to become an asset—tradable, stakeable, and secured by blockchain rails. Subscriptions are reimagined as tokenized passes. Tipping becomes transparent and on-chain. Entire fan communities can form gated ecosystems where creators set the rules, not platforms. There’s real technical infrastructure behind the promise too: smart contract-based monetization tools, native tipping systems, NFT access layers, and creator-specific DAO governance structures are all in motion. The team’s roadmap includes social plugins for existing platforms and an SDK for creator dApps. SUBBD isn’t merely challenging the YouTubes and Patreons of the world—it’s proposing a parallel creator-led economy where audiences fund creators directly, and attention becomes a tradable asset. As more influencers seek platform independence, $SUBBD may become the first real financial layer built around internet fandom itself. Solaxy Solaxy doesn’t rush to describe itself as a simple meme coin with utility. Instead, it builds quietly at the intersection of utility and responsibility. It is an L2 protocol that acts not only as connective tissue between Ethereum and Solana but also as a statement against the high-emission sprawl of earlier blockchain generations. What sets Solaxy apart isn’t just the technology, it’s the intent. Built with ecological design as a foundational principle, the network embeds green accountability directly into its staking model. Validators earn not just by locking capital but by contributing to carbon offset pools, verified through real-world partners and reflected transparently on-chain. For users, staking $SOLX becomes more than a yield-generating strategy—it’s a vote for sustainable infrastructure. Cross-chain movement is frictionless. Native support for EVM compatibility allows developers to migrate apps and liquidity without starting from scratch. The bridge mechanics are deliberately simplified to ensure high throughput without compromising decentralization, and the ecosystem is already expanding into DeFi, NFTs, and modular gaming frameworks. Where Solaxy truly resonates, though, is in its narrative. It offers more than transactions—it proposes a rebalancing, a way to participate in crypto without sidelining the planet. In a future where regulation and environmental scrutiny will only grow sharper, Solaxy may very well define what “clean” chain infrastructure looks like, quietly becoming indispensable. BTC Bull BTC Bull is more than just a tribute to Bitcoin’s dominance—it’s a mechanism built to respond to it in real time. Every upward move in BTC’s price activates key events within the project, creating a rhythm where the community benefits directly from Bitcoin’s strength. These aren’t vague promises. Specific milestones trigger automatic airdrops for token holders and supply burns that permanently reduce circulation. This milestone-based model transforms Bitcoin’s progress into tangible outcomes. As BTC hits preset thresholds, $BTCBULL becomes more scarce, and early supporters are rewarded with fresh tokens distributed transparently. It’s a system designed for people who don’t just cheer for Bitcoin—they track it closely, knowing that every major jump creates impact across the ecosystem. Dubbed one of the best presales by pages like 99Bitcoins and others, BTC Bull’s influence and popularity have seen a continuous spike in recent weeks. Wrapped in a playful visual identity and meme-rich marketing, BTC Bull still manages to offer structured utility. Community events, social contests, and token rewards all orbit around a single idea: celebrating Bitcoin’s climb while reinforcing its message through memes, staking, and strategic deflation. Built on Solana, the project also benefits from rapid transaction speeds and minimal fees, making it accessible for both active traders and casual holders. BTC Bull doesn’t attempt to imitate Bitcoin—it amplifies it. The project gives Bitcoin believers a way to experience real-time engagement with price action, offering both entertainment and incentive in one of the most straightforward yet powerful designs in the meme-token space. MIND of Pepe There are projects that follow the market and those that try to predict it. MIND of Pepe does something different. It interprets the crowd. Not through speculation, but through data harvested from the very platforms where narratives are born. This is not just a memecoin, and it certainly isn’t another AI gimmick. It is a live AI agent built around the idea that attention moves markets—and that memes are modern-day momentum indicators. At the core of MIND of Pepe is a system that processes real-time inputs from social media, tracking shifts in tone, keyword clusters, influencer activity, and trading chatter. This information is distilled into readable signals and alerts accessible to $MIND holders. Users are not just spectators; they can influence the AI’s behavior, vote on what platforms it listens to more closely, and even customize the type of analysis delivered. Where the token becomes truly interesting is in its function. $MIND grants access to dashboards, early trend indicators, and the potential to front-run meme cycles before they become mainstream narratives. Future plans include sentiment-weighted indexes, NFT-based brain modules that modify how the AI thinks, and on-chain engagement rewards tied to social accuracy. This project leans into the chaotic brilliance of crypto culture, but it does so with precision. It doesn’t just reflect the noise. It deciphers it. For those looking to invest not just in hype, but in the system that understands how hype is formed, MIND of Pepe offers a rare and timely edge. Conclusion With crypto no longer operating on the sidelines of policy or finance, the tone of the market has changed. This is not a moment defined by speculation alone but by a gradual alignment with long-term systems. As governments experiment with digital reserves and Bitcoin starts to resemble more than just a volatile asset, it becomes clearer which types of projects are built for this next phase. The names explored above reflect that shift in pace and purpose. Each one offers a different entry point into where crypto is heading, shaped by utility, vision, or well-timed mechanisms. For those watching the signs rather than chasing the noise, these tokens represent more than passing trends, and could be profitable investments for the coming months. title: US Dollar and Euro Brace for Crucial Fed Decision
body: Global financial markets are often interconnected, and shifts in major currencies like the US Dollar and Euro can have ripple effects that even touch the cryptocurrency world, influencing investor sentiment and capital flows. Currently, the spotlight is firmly on the upcoming Fed decision , a pivotal moment that is causing significant positioning in the Forex market . Traders and investors worldwide are keenly watching how these major currencies react. The Strengthening US Dollar Ahead of the Curve The US Dollar has shown notable strength recently. This uptick is largely attributed to anticipation surrounding the Federal Reserve’s monetary policy meeting. Stronger-than-expected economic data from the United States, particularly concerning employment and inflation, has fueled expectations that the Fed might maintain a cautious stance on potential interest rate cuts, or at least delay them further than initially anticipated. This prospect makes dollar-denominated assets more attractive, increasing demand for the currency. Several factors contribute to the dollar’s current edge: Robust US economic indicators suggest resilience. Higher relative Interest rates compared to many other developed economies. Safe-haven demand amidst global uncertainties. Why the Euro Exchange Rate Remains Resilient Despite the dollar’s upward momentum, the Euro exchange rate has demonstrated surprising resilience. The common currency has not seen a sharp decline against the greenback, managing to hold key support levels. This suggests underlying strength or perhaps differing expectations regarding the European Central Bank (ECB)’s future policy path. While the ECB is also navigating inflation and growth concerns, market participants might be pricing in a relatively slower pace of rate cuts compared to some earlier predictions, or simply waiting for clearer signals from both major central banks before making aggressive moves on the EUR/USD pair. Factors supporting the Euro’s resilience include: Signs of stabilization in the Eurozone economy. Potentially diverging policy paths between the Fed and ECB in the medium term. Existing market positions that are resistant to further significant Euro weakness. The Crucial Fed Decision : What to Expect? The upcoming Fed decision is the main event driving current market sentiment. The Federal Open Market Committee (FOMC) will announce its decision on the federal funds rate and release its economic projections. More importantly, the accompanying statement and the subsequent press conference by the Fed Chair will be dissected for clues about the future trajectory of monetary policy. Will the Fed signal a readiness to cut rates soon, or will they emphasize the need to see more evidence that inflation is sustainably moving towards their target? This communication is key. Market expectations are currently leaning towards the Fed holding Interest rates steady at this meeting. The focus is less on an immediate rate change and more on the forward guidance provided. Any hint about the timing and pace of potential future rate adjustments will significantly impact currency valuations, particularly the US Dollar . Understanding How Interest Rates Impact Currencies The relationship between Interest rates and currency strength is fundamental in the Forex market . Higher interest rates in a country tend to attract foreign investment seeking better returns on bonds and other interest-bearing assets. This increased demand for the country’s assets translates into increased demand for its currency, causing it to appreciate. Conversely, lower interest rates can make a currency less attractive to foreign investors, potentially leading to depreciation. For the US Dollar and Euro, the differential in Interest rates set by the Fed and the ECB, as well as expectations about how this differential will evolve, is a primary driver of the Euro exchange rate against the dollar (EUR/USD). Navigating the Forex Market Volatility Post-Decision The period immediately following the Fed decision is often marked by significant volatility in the Forex market . The reaction will depend heavily on how the Fed’s announcement aligns with or deviates from market expectations. Here are potential scenarios and their likely impact on the Euro exchange rate (EUR/USD): Fed Outcome Likely Tone Impact on USD Impact on EUR/USD Hold Rates, Signal Sooner Cuts Dovish Bearish Bullish (EUR strengthens vs USD) Hold Rates, Maintain Current Stance Neutral Neutral to Slightly Bullish Stable to Slightly Bearish Hold Rates, Emphasize Inflation Fight Hawkish Bullish Bearish (EUR weakens vs USD) Traders will be watching not just the rate decision itself, but the language used in the statement and the nuances in the Fed Chair’s press conference regarding economic outlook, inflation assessment, and the conditions required for future policy adjustments. Challenges and Risks in the Current Environment Trading the Forex market around major central bank decisions comes with inherent challenges. Market reactions can be swift and unpredictable, often leading to increased volatility and wider trading spreads. The main challenge is interpreting the central bank’s communication correctly and understanding how it will be perceived by the broader market. Risks include unexpected policy shifts, misinterpretation of guidance, and external economic or geopolitical events that could overshadow the Fed’s message. Actionable Insights: What to Watch For For those interested in how the Fed decision impacts the US Dollar , the Euro exchange rate , and the broader Forex market , here are some actionable insights: Focus on Forward Guidance: The statement and press conference commentary on the economic outlook and future policy path are more critical than the rate decision itself if rates are held steady. Monitor Economic Projections: The Fed’s updated Summary of Economic Projections (SEP), including the ‘dot plot’ showing policymakers’ individual rate expectations, can provide valuable insights into the likely pace of future rate changes. Watch Key Levels: Observe how the EUR/USD pair reacts around significant technical support and resistance levels immediately after the announcement. Risk Management: Given the potential for volatility, employ strict risk management strategies, such as using stop-loss orders. Conclusion: Awaiting the Verdict The stage is set for a significant move in the Forex market as participants await the outcome of the highly anticipated Fed decision . The US Dollar has gained ground on expectations of sustained higher Interest rates , while the Euro exchange rate has shown a degree of resilience. The clarity provided by the Federal Reserve regarding its economic outlook and future policy intentions will be paramount in determining the short-term direction of major currency pairs, particularly EUR/USD. Traders should remain vigilant and prepared for potential volatility as the market digests the central bank’s message. To learn more about the latest Forex market trends, explore our articles on key developments shaping the US Dollar, Euro, and interest rates outlook.

title: Why altcoin seasons may not be coming back
body: This is a segment from the Empire newsletter. To read full editions, subscribe . Unlike memecoins — which Blockworks Research thinks are here to stay — an altcoin szn may not come back…at least not in the way we’re used to. The 2020/2021 cycle may have been the peak, K33’s David Zimmerman wrote in a note. “Without fresh retail inflows, the math gets tougher for speculative tokens with no revenue, no product, and no roadmap beyond vibes,” he said. One of the big changes, outside of the overall maturity cycle we see, is that memecoins have really solidified themselves within crypto. To put it another way: Why play a narrative-driven token when you can make a memecoin play instead? As I wrote in the Milk Road last week, memecoins represented roughly 25% of the overall volumes in crypto at the peak of Q1. This means the path forward for altcoins is more likely to be selective. As Zimmerman noted, the overall “altcoin market faces $4.3 billion in token unlocks in May, $2.8 billion in June, and $3.2 billion in July. These unlocks are headwinds that demand a surge in new liquidity to be absorbed.” “In the absence of any significant surge of demand or new retail inflows, the math is simple: more supply facing static or shrinking demand equals downward pressure.” Outside of the obvious need for liquidity, times have simply changed. Back in the day, altcoins could get a boost just by being in proximity to a hot narrative. Now, there’s more of a need for fundamentals (I swear I’m not trying to keep bringing this up , it’s just what’s happening). Zimmerman said that bitcoin will remain dominant, but there will be chances to allocate smaller positions to altcoins. While some may outperform, the “windows are limited and increasingly fleeting.” Tokens may not continue to be the big winners as crypto matures. Take, for example, stablecoins. “The most bullish crypto asset outside of Bitcoin right now is almost certainly stablecoins. They are making their way into payment infrastructure, relentlessly growing in market cap, and positioning themselves at the center of both retail and institutional use cases,” Zimmerman said. In a sea of choices, now investors will have to pay attention to metrics before aping into a token (unless you stick with memecoins). For K33, this means understanding the product-market fit, user growth, or revenue of said token. RIP, face-ripping altcoin rallies. You were fun. But hello to a more — dare I say — serious era of crypto. Get the news in your inbox. Explore Blockworks newsletters: Blockworks Daily : Unpacking crypto and the markets. Empire : Crypto news and analysis to start your day. Forward Guidance : The intersection of crypto, macro and policy. 0xResearch : Alpha directly in your inbox. Lightspeed : All things Solana. The Drop : Apps, games, memes and more. Supply Shock : Bitcoin, bitcoin, bitcoin.

title: Litecoin Defends ETF Delay With 11% Surge above $90, Key Level To watch Is $100.
body: The post Litecoin Defends ETF Delay With 11% Surge above $90, Key Level To watch Is $100. appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News The Layer 1 crypto Litecoin (LTC) was seen in the 24-hour top gainers list, and Bitcoin(BTC) hit $97,000. Litecoin movement is a highlight of market, as the coin performed even after the negative news of the US SEC’s delaying the Litecoin Spot ETF applied by Canary Capital. LTC performance readings on a short term show a corrective approach, while the long-term performance is impressive and fuels new high cycles. Litecoin faces increased selling pressure. The Litecoin’s contrary performance to negative fundamentals is a breakthrough, and gaining back the $90 zone has also attracted confidence in the asset. On the other hand, the key indicators, MACD and CM,F show an upcoming cooling period and potential selling. The Chaikin Money Flow (CMF) indicator, which measures buying and selling pressure, is at the centre line(0), indicating weakening buying pressure, despite the rising prices. Litecoin in the short term could lose its upward momentum. On the other hand, Litecoin’s on-chain data Network Realized Profit/Loss (NPL) shows an increase in several unrealized gains, and this can turn the LTC market greedy anytime. Litecoins Weekly Chart Is Admiring LTC/USD in the weekly chart reflects its admirable performance since July 2022. The asset has created an upward channel while attempting a horizontal breakout 3 times. After being rejected by the top and a dramatic drop below the reversal, the price is now nearing the centre line, which is at the $100 mark. The RSI is approaching 50 from the bottom, andthe MACD is heading toward closing to 0, showing the momentum turning towards neutral Litecoin, the Good ride ahead In conclusion, as we see Litecoin’s performance since its April dips has been a great comeback to create key resistance $100. If the buyers loose control, we can see a price dril to $85 and of the market cycle continues to be bullish $105 is on the cards in next 2 weeks.

title: This XRP Breakout will Send Us To Valhalla- Analyst
body: In the dynamic world of cryptocurrency, few assets have garnered as much attention in recent months as XRP. A recent post by crypto analyst STEPH IS CRYPTO on X encapsulates the prevailing sentiment: “This XRP breakout will send us to Valhalla! ” This exclamation reflects the mounting excitement among investors and analysts who anticipate a significant upward movement in XRP’s price. This #XRP breakout will send us to Valhalla! pic.twitter.com/jEc3T1qSlV — STEPH IS CRYPTO (@Steph_iscrypto) May 6, 2025 Technical Patterns Indicate a Bullish Outlook XRP is currently exhibiting several bullish technical patterns that suggest a potential breakout. Analyst Rose has identified a falling wedge pattern, a formation that often precedes upward price movements. According to Rose, a breakout above the $2.60–$2.75 resistance zone could propel XRP to targets of $4.21 and potentially $4.95. Similarly, Captain Faibik has observed a symmetrical triangle pattern in XRP’s price action. A breakout from this formation could lead to a 50% surge, aiming for a price of approximately $3.66. These technical analyses underscore the growing optimism surrounding XRP’s near-term prospects. Institutional Developments and Market Sentiment Beyond technical indicators, institutional developments are also bolstering confidence in XRP. CME Group’s announcement to launch cash-settled XRP futures contracts on May 19, 2025, marks a significant milestone. This move reflects the increasing institutional interest in XRP and could enhance its liquidity and credibility in the broader financial markets. Additionally, Ripple Labs’ introduction of the RLUSD stablecoin is expected to strengthen XRP’s position in the cryptocurrency ecosystem. The stablecoin aims to facilitate more efficient cross-border transactions, a core use case for XRP. These developments contribute to a positive market sentiment, further fueling the anticipation of a breakout. We are on twitter, follow us to connect with us :- @TimesTabloid1 — TimesTabloid (@TimesTabloid1) July 15, 2023 Long-Term Price Projections Looking ahead, several analysts have provided ambitious price projections for XRP. EGRAG CRYPTO, a well-known figure in the crypto analysis community, has suggested that XRP could reach between $27 and $33 by May 2025 . This forecast is based on historical price patterns and Fibonacci retracement levels, drawing parallels to XRP’s performance during the 2017 bull run. Another analysis by EGRAG CRYPTO employs Fibonacci and Elliott Wave theories to predict a price of $15 for XRP by May 5, 2025. This projection considers the asset’s current position within a larger market cycle and anticipates a significant upward movement in the coming months. The convergence of bullish technical patterns, institutional advancements, and optimistic long-term forecasts paints a promising picture for XRP. While the cryptocurrency market remains inherently volatile, the current indicators suggest that XRP is poised for a significant breakout. As STEPH IS CRYPTO aptly put it, the anticipated surge could indeed “send us to Valhalla,” marking a new chapter in XRP’s journey within the digital asset landscape. title: Thumzup files $500m shelf registration, plans to grow Bitcoin reserves
body: Thumzup Media Corporation has filed an amendment to its universal shelf registration with the SEC, increasing the potential total offering amount from $200 million to $500 million. The company says the expanded registration is intended to support working capital needs and further its Bitcoin ( BTC ) reserve strategy. The amended Form S-3 filing would give Thumzup the ability to raise up to half a billion dollars over the next three years through the issuance of various securities, including common stock, preferred stock, warrants, debt securities, and other instruments. The registration is not yet effective, and no securities are being offered at this time. Thumzup currently holds 19.106 BTC, valued at approximately $1.8 million as of May 5, 2025. The company’s board has previously authorized allocating up to 90% of its liquid assets to Bitcoin as part of its treasury strategy. According to CEO Robert Steele, the move reflects increasing institutional confidence in Bitcoin, as well as the rollout of spot Bitcoin ETFs in the U.S. You might also like: Prosecutors face backlash for suppressing evidence in Samourai Wallet case $1 million in Bitcoin The company entered the crypto space last year with plans to allocate up to $1 million in Bitcoin. Thumzup believes the digital asset’s finite supply and resistance to inflation make it an attractive store of value and a strategic fit for corporate treasuries. The company is among a growing number of public firms incorporating Bitcoin into their reserve management. Based in Los Angeles, Thumzup operates a platform that helps brands compensate users for promoting them on social media platforms like Venmo and PayPal. The firm says the expanded shelf registration provides added flexibility as it scales operations and continues to explore digital asset strategies. Any future capital raise under this shelf registration will be subject to SEC approval and detailed in a prospectus supplement at the time of offering. You might also like: Crypto.com doubles down on US operations by opening office in Washington D.C.

title: Can Ethereum (ETH) Outperform Bitcoin (BTC) in 2025?
body: TL;DR Although it has moved a little from the multi-year low against BTC recorded earlier this year, ETH continues to struggle when compared to the largest cryptocurrency (and also the greenback). However, ChatGPT outlined several factors that can help it recover some ground and end the year on a high note. Tech Factors It has been said time and time again in the past several months that ETH’s price has failed to copy any of BTC’s momentum. While the largest cryptocurrency surged to a new all-time high in January 2025 at almost $110,000, Ethereum was stopped on a couple of occasions at $4,000 and came nowhere near its 2021 peak. The current price tag of just over $1,800 means that ETH actually trades lower against the dollar now than it did before the US elections (generally considered the beginning of the current cycle). The ETH/BTC trading pair reached a five-year low at under 0.018 a few weeks back and now sits very close to those levels. Just for reference, the pair was above 0.15 during the 2017/2018 cycle when there was speculation about a potential “flippening.” That’s an 88% plunge! ETH/BTC. Source: TradingView Nevertheless, some analysts are still hopeful that ETH can make a comeback, and ChatGPT outlined what needs to happen for Ethereum to outperform its ‘bigger brother’ (is it really a brother?). The AI chatbot started by laying out the technological advancements the second-largest blockchain needs to go through, such as improved scalability. Network upgrades, such as the just-completed Pectra, can enhance usability and restore some investor confidence in the underlying asset. Market Sentiment ChatGPT noted that both assets attract different types of investors. Bitcoin is seen as “the digital gold, with institutions and individuals largely viewing it as a hedge against inflation and a store of value.” “Ethereum’s value proposition, though, lies in its use case as a programmable blockchain. If Ethereum gains wider adoption and institutional interest—especially in sectors like decentralized finance (DeFi), enterprise blockchain solutions, or NFTs—it could experience significant growth.” Consequently, ETH needs to continue building within its own niche, even though Vitalik Buterin recently made some references to BTC’s simplicity. However, there’s a lot of competition within that field, and Ethereum trails behind some other big names, such as Solana, in terms of transaction speeds and costs. The Layer-2 solutions, which aim to solve both, have also faced a lot of criticism lately. In conclusion, the AI chatbot said Ethereum “has the potential to outperform Bitcoin in certain areas,” but the latter’s role as the “primary store of value and its established position in the market may provide it with a more stable long-term growth trajectory.” In other words, ChatGPT is not too bullish on ETH outperforming BTC this year. The post Can Ethereum (ETH) Outperform Bitcoin (BTC) in 2025? appeared first on CryptoPotato .

title: USD Weakness Ahead of Pivotal FOMC and BoE Decisions
body: In the dynamic world of global finance, shifts in currency values often signal broader economic trends that can ripple across all asset classes, including cryptocurrencies. Recently, the focus has been on the USD which has shown signs of underperformance, while the TWD has experienced appreciation. This movement comes at a critical juncture, right before highly anticipated meetings by two major central banks: the US Federal Reserve’s FOMC and the Bank of England ( BoE ). Understanding these shifts in the Forex market provides valuable context for investors navigating the current economic climate. Why is the USD Under Pressure? The recent softness observed in the USD can be attributed to a confluence of factors. Market participants are keenly watching incoming economic data, particularly inflation figures and labor market reports. Expectations regarding the future path of interest rates by the Federal Reserve play a significant role. Any hint that the Fed might be nearing the end of its tightening cycle, or might even consider rate cuts sooner than previously anticipated, tends to weigh on the dollar. Key reasons for the current USD performance include: Changing interest rate expectations: Markets are pricing in potential rate adjustments, influencing capital flows. Relative economic performance: Data from other major economies might be showing comparative strength. Risk sentiment: Shifts in global risk appetite can affect demand for safe-haven currencies like the USD . Yield differentials: The attractiveness of US assets relative to those in other countries impacts currency values. The TWD ‘s Recent Strength While the USD has faced headwinds, the TWD (New Taiwan Dollar) has shown resilience and even appreciation. This performance is often linked to Taiwan’s strong position in the global technology supply chain, particularly in semiconductors. Increased demand for these exports can boost the Taiwanese economy and its currency. Additionally, local economic conditions and capital flows into Taiwanese assets can contribute to the TWD ‘s strength. The relative stability of Taiwan’s economic outlook, especially compared to uncertainties elsewhere, can make the TWD an attractive currency for some investors. Anticipating the FOMC Meeting The upcoming FOMC meeting is arguably the most significant event on the immediate economic calendar for the Forex market . The Federal Reserve’s decisions and forward guidance have a profound impact on global interest rates and currency valuations. Market participants will be dissecting the official statement, the economic projections (Summary of Economic Projections – SEP), and the subsequent press conference by the Fed Chair. What the market is watching for from the FOMC : Interest Rate Decision: Will rates be held steady, increased, or is there a surprise? Dot Plot: The SEP’s ‘dot plot’ shows FOMC members’ individual expectations for future interest rates, offering clues about the policy path. Economic Outlook: The Fed’s assessment of inflation, employment, and GDP growth will shape expectations. Forward Guidance: Any language indicating the Fed’s stance on future policy moves is critical. Any hawkish signals (suggesting higher rates for longer) would likely support the USD , while dovish signals (suggesting rate cuts are closer) would likely reinforce USD weakness. What to Expect from the BoE Decision Simultaneously, the Bank of England ( BoE ) is also set to announce its latest monetary policy decision. The UK economy faces its own set of challenges, including persistent inflation and concerns about growth. Like the FOMC , the BoE ‘s decision on interest rates and its economic outlook will heavily influence the value of the British Pound (GBP) and have spillover effects on the broader Forex market . Key points for the BoE meeting: Interest Rate Vote Split: The vote among Monetary Policy Committee (MPC) members reveals the divergence of views within the bank. Inflation Forecasts: The BoE’s view on future inflation is central to its policy stance. Growth Projections: The bank’s assessment of the UK economy’s health. Communication: The tone of the statement and any comments from the Governor. A more hawkish BoE (hiking rates or signaling more hikes) would typically strengthen the GBP, while a dovish stance (holding rates or signaling cuts) would weaken it. The interplay between the FOMC and BoE outcomes creates significant volatility potential in pairs like GBP/USD. Impact on the Forex Market : Scenarios and Insights The simultaneous nature of these central bank meetings creates a period of heightened uncertainty and potential volatility across the Forex market . Traders and investors will be reacting swiftly to the announcements, leading to potentially sharp movements in currency pairs. The relative hawkishness or dovishness of the FOMC versus the BoE will determine the direction of pairs like GBP/USD. Similarly, the USD ‘s reaction will impact pairs like USD/TWD, EUR/USD, and USD/JPY. Actionable Insights for Traders Stay Informed: Pay close attention to the official statements and press conferences from both the FOMC and BoE . Manage Risk: Volatility is expected. Use appropriate risk management tools like stop-losses. Watch Key Levels: Identify significant support and resistance levels on currency charts. Consider Multiple Outcomes: Be prepared for different scenarios based on the central banks’ decisions and guidance. Focus on Relative Policy: It’s not just about what one central bank does, but how it compares to the other. For those interested in the broader financial landscape, including cryptocurrencies, understanding these major Forex market events is crucial. Central bank policies on interest rates and liquidity directly influence the macroeconomic environment, which in turn affects investor sentiment and capital allocation across all asset classes, including digital assets. Summary: Navigating the Central Bank Gauntlet The coming days are critical for the global Forex market as both the US Federal Reserve’s FOMC and the Bank of England ( BoE ) convene. The recent underperformance of the USD and the relative strength of the TWD set a fascinating backdrop for these pivotal meetings. Market participants are on high alert for clues about the future trajectory of interest rates and economic health from both central banks. The outcomes will not only dictate the short-term movements in major currency pairs but also provide significant signals about the global economic outlook, influencing investment decisions across markets, including the evolving cryptocurrency space. Navigating this period requires careful analysis, vigilance, and a focus on understanding the nuances of central bank communication. To learn more about the latest Forex market trends, explore our articles on key developments shaping USD , TWD , GBP and interest rates ahead of FOMC and BoE decisions.

title: XRP open interest collapses from 1-month high
body: Summary ⚈ XRP open interest fell from 1.52B to 1.37B as price dipped 5.3%. ⚈ Despite declines, XRP’s long/short ratio remains near 1-month highs, signaling optimism. ⚈ Ripple v. SEC case conclusion could trigger a market-wide boost for XRP. XRP ’s open interest has seen a marked decline since the token dropped below $2.20 in the opening days of May. On April 28, the number of open XRP derivatives positions reached a 1-month high of 1.52 billion. By May 6, the cryptocurrency’s open interest had declined to 1.37 billion per data retrieved by Finbold from market intelligence platform CryptoQuant , indicating a greatly lessened degree of speculative betting on the part of traders. XRP open interest on April 28 and May 6. Source: CryptoQuant In the same timeframe, the price of XRP declined from $2.26 to $2.14 — a 5.3% drop. By press time on May 7, the token’s price had further declined to $2.13, bringing XRP year-to-date (YTD) returns down to just 2.58%. XRP price year-to-date (YTD) chart. Source: Finbold However, in contrast with these bearish developments, there are a few factors at play that suggest XRP prices could soon rebound. Despite low XRP open interest, a significant percentage of traders remain bullish While derivatives positions have declined on the whole, it should be noted that XRP’s long/short ratio remains close to 1-month highs , which demonstrates a healthy dose of bullish sentiment. Moreover, whales have quietly continued with their acquisitions — having bought 900 million tokens in April alone. In addition, Ripple Labs reiterated the importance of the conclusion of the Ripple v. SEC case in its Q1 2025 XRP markets report . Although the case will, most likely, formally conclude in October at the earliest , the new set of regulations that the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) is expected to issue in tandem with the matter’s closing could provide a market-wide boost — one that XRP would most likely see the greatest benefit from. Featured image from Shutterstock The post XRP open interest collapses from 1-month high appeared first on Finbold .

title: Ethereum (ETH), Binance Coin (BNB), and Sonic (SONIC) Set for Breakout: Crypto Surge Ahead
body: Crypto is rising and investors are just beginning to see the possibilities. A big surge could be on the way with the crypto market potentially establishing a bottom and now swinging back up. Ethereum (ETH), Binance Coin (BNB), and Sonic (SONIC) are layer 1s with breakouts in their sights. $ETH about to embark on its next big swing high Source: TradingView The $ETH price has been under duress for what seems like a very long time now. As Bitcoin ( BTC ) has stolen the show, breaking out strongly, and perhaps now heading back to its highs, the $ETH price has generally slumbered. However, things could be about to change. Ethereum is still the number two cryptocurrency by market capitalization - only second to Bitcoin. The $ETH price looks to have found a bottom, and could be about to break through a descending trendline that has followed the price down since mid-December 2024. This potential swing up from the bottom is supported by the Stochastic RSI in the weekly time frame, which is just about to signal strong upside price momentum. Once $ETH breaks out, and the bulls are able to push the price above the next two major resistances, the rally has to target the last swing high at $4,100. If it fails to get there, it would be a failed rally, while confirming above would give the bulls a shot at the all-time high. $BNB breakout taking place now Source: TradingView Looking at the weekly chart for $BNB it can be seen that the breakout is taking place right now. The bulls broke through the descending trendline last week, and the price came back to confirm the breakout (plus major support) this week. As long as it stays above by the end of play on Sunday, all will be ready for lift-off. The $BNB price has now spent more than a year in this generally sideways price action, and so a breakout here could be a very strong one indeed. The next major resistance is at $674, and if the price is able to break through this and confirm above, this could become the platform for the rest of this bull market. $SONIC building price structure base Source: TradingView The $SONIC price has been meandering sideways since February, laying down the foundational price structure for the next big surge to $0.50. It looks as though $0.26 is becoming a good support level, so it just remains for the price to rise above the $0.28 resistance and head once more up to $0.34. If the price can take hold above this, it would then be based on top of that aforementioned base price structure, and then $0.50, and even $0.79 could follow. } else if (value >= 1000) { return (value / 1000).toFixed(2).replace(/\.00$/, '') + 'K'; } else if (value >= 1) { return value.toFixed(2); } else if (value >= 0.1) { return value.toFixed(4); } else if (value >= 0.01) { return value.toFixed(5); } else if (value >= 0.001) { // 0.001 to 0.00999 (6 decimal places) return value.toFixed(6); } else if (value >= 0.0001) { // 0.0001 to 0.000999 (6 decimal places) return value.toFixed(6); } else if (value >= 0.00001) { // 0.00001 to 0.0000999 (8 decimal places) return value.toFixed(8); } else if (value >= 0.000001) { // 0.000001 to 0.00000999 (9 decimal places) return value.toFixed(9); } else if (value >= 0.0000001) { // 0.0000001 to 0.000000999 (10 decimal places) return value.toFixed(10); } else if (value >= 0.00000001) { // 0.00000001 to 0.0000000999 (11 decimal places) return value.toFixed(11); } else if (value >= 0.000000001) { // 0.000000001 to 0.00000000999 (12 decimal places) return value.toFixed(12); } else if (value >= 0.0000000001) { // 0.0000000001 to 0.000000000999 (12 decimal places) return value.toFixed(12); } else { // Less than 0.0000000001 (13 decimal places) return value.toFixed(13); } } }); title: Companies Left and Right Are Buying Solana, Promising a Rally. Will the Solaxy Presale Explode?
body: SOL Strategies, a Canadian investment company focused on the Solana ecosystem, just bought 122,524 $SOL at an average price of $148.96. This brings the total purchase value to $18.25M. It’s worth noting that this acquisition is part of the company’s $500M convertible note facility with ATW Partners. An institutional purchase like this also aligns with SOL Strategies’ wider plans to expand its validator business. A validator, in case you didn’t know, is a blockchain participant that verifies and adds new transactions on the blockchain. The more assets a participant ‘stakes,’ the more chances that it ‘validates’ the next block. In this article, we’ll quickly unpack Solana’s positive future outlook and also suggest why the Solaxy presale is among the best cryptos to buy now , seeing as it won’t just benefit from a $SOL boom but also fuel one. Institutions Keen on Buying $SOL SOL Strategies seems to be following in the footsteps of MicroStrategy (now, Strategy), which has acquired more than 528,000 $BTC over the last few years. Similarly, DeFi Development Corp. (JNVR) has submitted an SEC application to raise $1B through a fresh security issue. It plans to use the funds (or a part of them) to purchase $SOL. Note that it already holds $48.2M worth of the asset. As a result of its fresh $SOL purchase, SOL Strategies’ shares have jumped over 90% in the last two weeks. It’s currently trading at around CA$2.6. These purchases directly strengthen our three-pillar strategy of enterprise grade validators, strategic SOL holdings, and Solana technology innovation. – SOL Strategies CEO Leah Wald . It’s worth noting that Solana has also been showing great technical strength of late. After dipping past $100 during the tariff sell-off, the token has risen around 50% and is now trading at $147. The bounce has also occurred from the 200 EMA (exponential moving average), which is a strong bullish indicator. Although far from its all-time high of $295, large institutional buying is a solid vote of confidence in the long-term viability of the project. If you believe in Solana’s future and want to ride its growth, there could hardly be an altcoin better than Solaxy. After all, it’s the first-ever Solana L2 that overcomes all the shortcomings of Solana L1. What Is Solaxy ($SOLX)? Solaxy ($SOLX) is a new cryptocurrency that plans to solve all of Solana’s troubles. As mentioned earlier, despite the fact that Solana’s popularity is consistently increasing, the blockchain network wouldn’t be able to reach its full potential ($300 and beyond) until it fixes its congestion and scalability issues. These problems came into existence when hyper-successful coins like $TRUMP and $MELANIA, as well as the meme coin launchpad Pump.fun, brought in a flurry of new investors to Solana. This clogged the network, which started experiencing performance bottlenecks during heavy traffic. Solaxy will build the first-ever Layer 2 solution on Solana. Essentially, Solaxy’s answer to Solana’s troubles is offloading some transactions from the network’s mainnet onto a sidechain. That’s not all, though, because as part of Solaxy’s cutting-edge roll-up technology, it will also bundle multiple transactions into single, optimized batches. These will then be sent for on-chain validation. Overall, Solaxy will reduce the congestion on Solana and increase its affordability without sacrificing the network’s security. The Solaxy Presale Has Raised Over $33.5M in Early Investor Funding $SOLX dominates our list of the best crypto presales on the market right now thanks to class-leading investor interest in the project. Even better, Solaxy is looking all set to return the investors’ confidence in kind. As per our $SOLX price prediction , the token could explode nearly 12,000% and reach a high of $0.20 by the end of 2030. It’s worth noting that Solaxy’s unprecedented future potential is also because it’s more than just a medicine for Solana. $SOLX, a multi-chain token, can also be used for high-frequency dApps. These include: Platforms for meme coins and micro-transactions, Gaming ecosystems that need real-time interactions, and Custom financial applications that require low latency and cost efficiency. If you want to catch Solaxy before it becomes a top trending crypto , now’s the best time to buy it. It’s currently in presale, so you can buy $SOLX now for a low price of $0.001716. For more help with the purchase process, check out our detailed guide on how to buy Solaxy . If you’d like to know more about the project, read through its whitepaper . Also, check out its X feed and Telegram channel for timely updates. Last but not least, kindly remember that despite their breathtaking potential, both Solaxy and Solana could fall short of your expectations. But that’s just how the crypto market is, i.e., unpredictable and volatile. Also, this article isn’t financial advice, and you must do your own research before investing.

title: Amazon AI: Revolutionizing Code Generation with Project Kiro
body: In the fast-evolving world of technology, where innovation often dictates the pace of progress in sectors like blockchain and cryptocurrency, the tools developers use are constantly being redefined. Imagine a future where building the next decentralized application or optimizing smart contracts becomes significantly faster and more intuitive. This vision is becoming clearer as major tech players invest heavily in artificial intelligence, particularly in automating development tasks. Today, we’re looking at a significant move from one of the biggest names in cloud computing that could dramatically impact how code is written: Amazon’s latest venture into AI Code Generation . Amazon AI’s Ambitious ‘Kiro’ Project Amazon Web Services (AWS), the cloud powerhouse behind countless online services and a critical infrastructure provider for many crypto projects, is reportedly deep into developing a new AI-powered code generation tool. Codenamed “Kiro,” this ambitious project aims to provide developers with a powerful assistant capable of transforming natural language prompts and existing data into functional code. According to reports based on internal documents, Kiro is designed to interact with AI agents to generate code in what’s described as “near real-time.” This capability suggests a highly responsive system that can keep pace with a developer’s workflow, providing code snippets, functions, or even larger blocks of code almost instantly as they work. What Makes Kiro a Potential Game-Changer? Beyond simple code suggestions, Kiro is envisioned as a comprehensive Coding Assistant . Here are some of the key features and capabilities reported: Multimodal Capabilities: While the exact nature of its multimodal functions isn’t fully detailed, this could imply the tool’s ability to understand and generate code based on various inputs, such as text prompts, code examples, documentation, or even potentially visual representations like diagrams. Web and Desktop Applications: Kiro is expected to be accessible through both web and dedicated desktop applications, offering flexibility for developers working in different environments. Third-Party AI Agent Integration: A particularly interesting aspect is the ability to configure Kiro to work with third-party AI agents. This open approach could allow developers to leverage specialized AI models or services alongside Kiro, enhancing its capabilities for specific tasks or programming languages relevant to diverse fields, including complex smart contract development or data analysis for crypto markets. Beyond Code Generation: Kiro’s utility extends beyond just writing code. Reports indicate it can also generate technical design documents, automatically flag potential issues or bugs in the generated code, and even suggest optimizations for performance or efficiency. How Does Kiro Compare to Existing AWS AI Tools? Amazon isn’t new to the AI coding space. They already offer Amazon CodeWhisperer, an AI-powered coding companion, and more recently launched Q Developer, an evolution described as akin to GitHub Copilot. While Q Developer focuses on being a helpful coding assistant providing suggestions and answering questions within the IDE, Kiro appears to be a more advanced, agent-driven system focused explicitly on generating larger, more complex code structures and related documentation from higher-level prompts. It represents a significant step forward in Amazon’s commitment to leveraging AWS AI for developer productivity. The Hot Market for Generative AI Tools Amazon’s move into this advanced form of AI Code Generation comes at a time when the market for Generative AI Tools aimed at developers is experiencing explosive growth and significant investment. The demand for tools that can automate coding tasks, speed up development cycles, and lower the barrier to entry for building complex applications is immense. The competitive landscape is heating up rapidly. Companies like Anysphere, makers of the Cursor code editor, have reportedly achieved valuations reaching $9 billion, signaling strong investor confidence in AI-native development environments. Similarly, Windsurf, another player in this space, is reportedly nearing a potential acquisition by OpenAI for a substantial $3 billion. These figures underscore the perceived value and future potential of tools that can effectively harness AI to assist or even perform coding tasks. While Amazon was reportedly considering a launch for Kiro towards the end of June, those plans might be subject to change. Nevertheless, the existence and reported capabilities of Project Kiro signal Amazon’s serious intent to become a dominant force in the AI-assisted development market. What Does This Mean for Developers and the Tech Ecosystem? The rise of powerful AI coding assistants like Kiro has profound implications. For developers, it could mean faster prototyping, less time spent on boilerplate code, and more focus on complex problem-solving and creative aspects of development. For companies, it promises increased productivity and potentially lower development costs. In sectors like blockchain, where rapid iteration and secure, efficient code are paramount, tools like Kiro could accelerate the development of decentralized applications, smart contracts, and infrastructure. The ability to quickly generate code, flag potential security issues, and create technical documentation could be invaluable. However, it also raises questions about the future role of developers, the potential for new types of bugs or vulnerabilities introduced by AI-generated code, and the need for developers to adapt and learn how to effectively collaborate with these powerful AI tools. The focus may shift from writing every line of code to guiding, verifying, and refining AI-generated outputs. Summary: Amazon’s Bold Step in AI Code Generation Amazon Web Services’ development of Project Kiro represents a significant investment in the future of software development. By building an advanced AI code generation tool capable of real-time output, multimodal input, and integration with other AI agents, Amazon is positioning itself at the forefront of the generative AI revolution in coding. As the market for these tools continues to grow rapidly, Kiro has the potential to become a key player, fundamentally changing how developers work and accelerating innovation across various industries, including those leveraging AWS infrastructure for cryptocurrency and blockchain technologies. To learn more about the latest AI market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping AI features.

title: Dow Jones, S&P 500, Nasdaq rise amid U.S.-China trade talks
body: U.S. stocks rose on Wednesday as markets reacted to news of trade talks between China and the United States. S&P 500 gained 0.32% as it opened higher after consecutive sessions of downward pressure for stocks . While the Nasdaq was up by 0.29%, the Dow Jones Industrial Average edged higher at the open, climbing more than 200 points as investor attention turned to the Federal Reserve’s interest rate decision expected later in the day. Gains sees the major U.S. indices appear set to end a two-day losing streak that materialized as markets remained cautious amid tariffs uncertainty . However, news that top U.S. officials were set to meet their Chinese counterparts buoyed sentiment. Futures tied to the three major indexes rose as investors welcomed the prospect of formal trade talks between the two countries. You might also like: Dow Jones drops 400 points as tariffs are back in focus With stocks having rallied before on bullish takes regarding the U.S.-China trade talks, analysts say clarity would be welcome. But given the likelihood that nothing much happens in coming weeks has dampened the upward look. Investors are thus watching out for developments in this tariffs space. Notably, the most recent labor data from the Bureau of Labor Statistics indicated an addition of 177,000 jobs in April. This was above the expectations of 138,000, with this coming in as the unemployment rate held at 4.2%. While this showed a solid April, tariff concerns linger. Robert Kaplan, Goldman Sachs vice chairman and former Dallas Fed president, told CNBC’s ‘Squawk Box’ on Wednesday that the tariff issues will need to be solved first before the U.S. economy sees a further slowdown. The immediate market attention is also on the Federal Reserve, which is completing its two-day meeting on May 7. Key to investors will be the Fed’s policy decision and Chair Jerome Powell’s speech. While markets have priced in a 96% chance that the central bank will keep rates unchanged, focus will be on Powell. In particular, it will be on what he says about the U.S. economy as well as what the Fed sees as its trajectory for interest rates. You might also like: Whales increase Bitcoin holdings by over 81K BTC amid recent retail sell-off: Santiment

title: The Critical Day Has Come: FED Interest Rate Decision Expected in Bitcoin Today! What Time Will It Be Announced? Here Are the Expectations and Everything You Ne...
body: Bitcoin soared above $97,000 after news that the US and China will resume tariff talks. At this point, the announcement of the meeting between the two countries improved investor confidence in the crypto market and increased major altcoins such as Ethereum (ETH), XRP, Cardano (ADA) and Dogecoin (DOGE), apart from Bitcoin. With the US-China trade war winding down, attention has turned to today’s FED decision, an important macro event that could determine Bitcoin’s short-term direction. After January, when the FED kept interest rates constant, dollar, gold, stock market and cryptocurrency investors are wondering when the first interest rate cut of 2025 will be made, while it remains uncertain whether the FED will make a surprise. When Will the May FED Interest Rate Decision Be Announced? The FED will announce its May interest rate decision on May 7, 2025 at 21:00 Turkish time. Following the decision, FED Chairman Jerome Powell will make oral statements at 21:30. In Which Direction Are Expectations Focused? While the overwhelming majority of the market, 98%, expects the FED to keep the policy rate constant in the range of 4.25% – 4.50%, only a small segment of 2% expects interest rates to be reduced to the range of 4.00% – 4.25%. At this point, the market does not expect the FED to cut interest rates due to the negative conditions created by the tariffs. Experts believe the Fed will prefer to wait and see how the new tariffs will affect the U.S. economy before changing interest rates. Deutsche Bank analysts think that the Fed will hold off on interest rate cuts for a longer period of time and keep interest rates steady this month to see how the economic picture will shape in the coming months. Olu Sonola, Head of US Economic Research at Ritch Ratings, said the latest employment report was good in every way. Noting that the labor market indicated resilience rather than recession in the latest report, Sonola argued that the latest economic data was also positive, but that the FED would wait on reducing interest rates. Powell Statements Are Very Important! While it is unlikely that the FED will make a surprise rate cut as expected, signals from the policy text and Powell's statements are expected to have an impact on the direction of the markets. At this point, Powell's stance on inflation, growth and interest rate cuts will guide the Bitcoin and crypto markets. Experts say Powell is cornered and that Powell and the FED have a difficult choice to make. “Keep interest rates steady and risk further economic slowdown, or cut rates and risk reigniting inflation.” US President Donald Trump is also pressuring the Fed to lower interest rates. What Awaits Bitcoin and Crypto Markets? It is stated that if Powell's attitude in his speech is moderate, a new upward momentum can be expected in Bitcoin and altcoins, while it is estimated that a hawkish attitude may cause the BTC price to retest the support around $92,000. *This is not investment advice. Continue Reading: The Critical Day Has Come: FED Interest Rate Decision Expected in Bitcoin Today! What Time Will It Be Announced? Here Are the Expectations and Everything You Need to Know!

title: Tether Brings USDT to Line’s 196 Million Users Through Kaia
body: The company recently partnered with Line Next to bring its flagship USDT token to the Kaia blockchain. This will make the seamless integration into Line’s messenger-based Mini DApp ecosystem possible. This will also allow users to send and receive USDT for payments, DeFi, and peer-to-peer transactions directly with a familiar platform. Additionally, Tether strengthened its compliance infrastructure by partnering with Chainalysis to integrate institutional-grade monitoring tools into its Hadron platform for tokenizing real-world assets (RWAs). This move supports the growing regulatory demands and builds confidence among institutional users. Tether is also pushing into artificial intelligence with the upcoming launch of Tether AI, a decentralized, open-source platform that merges crypto payments with censorship-resistant AI services. Tether Expands Presence in Asia Tether recently expanded its flagship stablecoin, USDT, to the Kaia blockchain through a new partnership with Line Next, the Web3 division of Japan’s messaging giant Line. The move integrates USDT into Line’s messenger-based Mini DApp ecosystem and its self-custodial wallet, and allows users to send and receive the stablecoin for payments, cross-border transfers, and DeFi-related activities in an interface they already use daily. According to Tether’s May 7 announcement , this collaboration enhances the accessibility of stablecoins in everyday consumer life, particularly in Asia. Tether CEO Paolo Ardoino pointed out that the expansion is part of the company’s commitment to boost global stablecoin adoption, especially in Asia’s tech-savvy markets. Users of Line will also be able to earn mission-based rewards in USDT and conduct peer-to-peer transfers via the in-app wallet. More features are also expected in the future. Key features (Source: Tether ) Kaia blockchain, the infrastructure behind Line’s Mini DApps, offers instant finality and low-latency transactions, which makes it very well-suited for stablecoin integration. Kaia DLT Foundation chair Sam Seo explained that the partnership’s goal is to deliver a fast and seamless USDT experience across various platforms, including Line, DeFi applications, and centralized exchanges. Youngsu Ko, CEO of Line Next, said the collaboration will serve as a ”dollar-based gateway,” helping users access Web3 services more easily and making them more practical for daily use. USDT is still the world’s largest stablecoin, with a circulating supply of more than 149.4 billion tokens. Tether is also making it a priority to expand its footprint aggressively by minting another $1 billion USDT on the Tron network on May 5, which now holds $71.4 billion of the token. Tether Partners with Chainalysis for RWA Monitoring Tether also recently announced a new partnership with blockchain analytics firm Chainalysis to improve compliance and risk monitoring across its growing tokenization platform. The integration brings Chainalysis' suite of institutional-grade tools directly onto the Hadron by Tether platform, which was launched in November of 2024 to serve institutions, corporations, and governments interested in tokenizing real-world assets (RWAs). These assets include a wide range of instruments like financial products, real estate, commodities, and debt. The collaboration is part of the broader shift in the crypto landscape toward increased regulatory oversight and a heightened focus on transparency. Tether’s CEO, Paolo Ardoino, said that the integration allows for robust risk management, real-time transaction monitoring, and Know-Your-Transaction (KYT) capabilities without undermining the decentralized ethos of blockchain technology. The move is also expected to improve institutional confidence in using blockchain for high-value asset transfers. Since Hadron’s debut, the tokenized RWA sector saw a lot of growth. Data from RWA.xyz indicates the total market value of tokenized RWAs surged to $22 billion, which is up 10.5% over the past month, with the number of RWA token holders rising 5.6% to reach 100,115. This growth certainly suggests that platforms like Hadron are gaining traction as viable infrastructure for the token economy. RWA market overview (Source: RWA.xyz ) Chainalysis was founded in 2014, and cemented its role as a cornerstone of blockchain compliance infrastructure. It already partners with major industry players including Crypto.com, Bitfinex, MoonPay, and Spanish banking giant BBVA. The firm expanded its capabilities over the past few months through the acquisition of Web3 security firm Hexagate in December 2024 and AI fraud detection startup Alterya in January 2025. These moves made it possible for Chainalysis to address the challenges of digital asset security and fraud, especially as the firm forecasts that 2025 could see a record surge in crypto scams driven by advances in artificial intelligence. The financial strength behind this expansion is also interesting. Tether posted an operating profit of $1 billion for the first quarter of 2025, after generating $13 billion in profits throughout 2024. The partnership with Chainalysis signals that Tether is ready for yet another successful year by expanding its footprint in regulated, institutional markets. Tether Expands Into AI In addition to all of its other developments, Tether is also preparing to launch its new artificial intelligence platform, Tether AI. This platform will integrate cryptocurrency payments and operate on a decentralized infrastructure. CEO Paolo Ardoino unveiled the initiative on May 5 through a post on X, and called it a gateway to “personal infinite intelligence.” The platform will support peer-to-peer (P2P) transactions in major cryptocurrencies, including USDT and Bitcoin, enabling direct payments without centralized intermediaries. Tether AI is being designed as a fully open-source runtime environment, free from reliance on API keys or central control points. Ardoino explained that the platform will be modular, composable, and able to run on any device or hardware to offer maximum adaptability. Its decentralized structure aims to provide a censorship-resistant AI experience, which will help it stick to Tether’s broader vision of technological freedom and self-sovereignty. The AI platform’s payment functionality will be enhanced through Tether’s open-source wallet development kit (WDK), which was launched in November of 2024. This toolkit allows developers to build self-custodial wallet applications for mobile, desktop, and web, ensuring users have complete control over their crypto assets. By combining this infrastructure with the AI platform, Tether is positioning itself to offer a seamless and privacy-focused experience for managing digital assets and AI tools in tandem. Tether AI is a key component of Tether’s expansion beyond stablecoins. In April 2024, the company underwent a restructuring to introduce new divisions focused on data, AI, and peer-to-peer applications, under the umbrella of Tether Data. This pivot will help achieve the company’s long-term ambition to lead in both decentralized finance and decentralized intelligence. Ardoino also previously shared that the Tether AI division is working on multiple applications, including translation tools, voice assistants, and AI-powered Bitcoin wallet assistants. Post from Paolo Ardoino (Source: X ) Drawing inspiration from science fiction author Isaac Asimov, Ardoino described AI as a force that will “become part of the very fabric of the universe.” With Tether AI, the company appears intent on building a decentralized framework that aligns with this expansive vision.
